text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump A month ago, this *Pres went on Fox and downplayed the potential lethality of the novel coronavirus and compared it to the seasonal flu. What a dumb ass!  People are dying and he  wants to reopen the country. 

*Impeached
